title: Vuxokoxoko bya Xithekiniki - Tempele ya Orbital
heading: Vuxokoxoko bya Xithekiniki

satellite.heading: Sathelayiti
satellite.specs:
Swipimelo: 50x58x64 mm
1P XikhwamaQube
Ndzilo: 245 gr
Switirhisiwa: aluminiyamu, nsuku, fiberglass ni swiphemu swa elektroniki.
Ku rhendzeleka: Ku tlakuka ka 525 ± 25 km; ku rhelela: SSO 97.6 ± 0.1°
Xihahampfhuka: PSLV (Polar Satellite Launch Vehicle) leyi fambisiwaka hi ISRO

antenna.heading: Antena/Xifaniso xo vatliwa
antenna.specs:
Swipimelo: 6 m (dyayimeta) e 1.2m (ku leha) .
Ndzilo: 46 kg
Switirhisiwa: aluminium, epoxy mirrored board, golden aluminium dome leyi hayekiweke hi xivumbeko xa scaffolding.

radio.heading: Swihlawulekisi swa Radio
radio.specs:
Xihlanganisi xa le hansi: 468.5 MHz
Ku cinca-cinca ka swilo: CSS
Ku anama ka bandwidth: TBD
